titles.title: Oh The Spirit Of The Lord Is Here

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh the spirit of the Lord is here
I can feel his presence ever so near
As we lift Him up in worship and praise
As we magnify His holy name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He will touch us if we'll only believe
So open up your heart and now receive
Cast aside your every doubt and fear
For the spirit of the Lord is here
